note: Feature: Add Rework status, fix feedback export, improve UI/UX, and enhance Admin features

history.message: Feature: Add Rework status, fix feedback export, improve UI/UX, and enhance Admin features
Improvement: Add timestamp to release history and refine modal UI
Fix: Increase z-index of Feedback Modal and improve styling
Feature: Add Grid Density toggle to Shop, Clickable Dashboard Stats, and Email History in CRM
Feature: Add release history from git log to feedback page modal
Feature: Make release info clickable with detailed modal in Feedback Page
Feature: Add 'From' filter and System Overview to Feedback page
Fix: Improve scrolling and layout on Feedback page
Improvement: Add status/section filters to Feedback page and fix build error
Fix: Address all beta feedback (UX, Admin, CRM, Profile, Orders)
